info.name: Attendance
info.summary: Event attendance management with advance RSVP functionality and group-based statistics
info.description:
A small Nextcloud app for managing event attendance with advance RSVP functionality.
**For Administrators:** - Create and manage appointments with name, description, and date/time - Track responses with detailed attendance summaries organized by user groups - Identify non-responders to follow up - Toggle between upcoming and past appointments
**For All Users:** - Easy RSVP with Yes/No/Maybe responses to any appointment - Add optional comments with your response - Update responses anytime until the event date - Quick access via dashboard widget
**Group-Based Organization:** - Statistics automatically organized by Nextcloud user groups - See which group members haven't responded yet - Complete admin visibility into attendance across all groups
Perfect for organizations, teams, and communities that need to coordinate attendance for meetings, events, and activities.
info.author: Florian Ludwig
